description:
Sharypic makes photo sharing at events easy: collect all photos in one place and broadcast them live at your event with PhotoWall. Simply create your event, add photos and invite your friends to contribute from their mobile, Twitter, Instagram, Picasa, Flickr or Facebook. Perfect for every occasion where you don't want to miss a shot, such as weddings, trips, parties, concerts, or conferences.

With sharypic,
- Discover best events close to you or around the world
- Contribute to any public event by adding your pictures
- Create your own event, public or private, you decide
- Discover pictures of your event in real-time  from Twitter, Instagram, etc.
- Broadcast them live on TV or projector with PhotoWall
- Enjoy your event on mobile or from sharypic.com stunning gallery
- Spread the event to your friends and networks using Facebook, Twitter or Email
- Invite other photographers to contribute from their mobile live during the event or by adding Facebook, Flickr, Picasa, etc. albums or even by simple upload
- Vote for best photos
- Enjoy and relive your memories at anytime and everywhere
